text: Anton Germanovich Siluanov (; born 12 April 1963) is a Russian politician and economist. He is the Minister of Finance since 2011. He was the First Deputy Prime Minister of Russia from 2018 to 2020. In 2011, he was appointed Minister of Finance by Prime Minister Vladimir Putin. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Russian economists Category:Politicians from Moscow
title: Anton Siluanov
